oai_dc:dc.dc:title: To the freeholders of the county of Halifax [microform] /
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Howe, Joseph, 1804-1873.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: " ... to force back the political institutions ... to what they were five or six years ago ... are you willing to ... go back to ... 1836?"--p. 15.
Filmed from a copy of the original publication held by the Nova Scotia Legislative Library.
